page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Located midway between{Southampton} and the{New Forest}our area is rural urban fringe. The East of the 'D' block is mainly the sprawling dormitory settlement of{Totton}whilst the rest of the area consists of fairly low lying, gently sloping, poor quality agricultural land. Large new housing estates occupy land on the outskirts of Totton. New road schemes speed the flow of traffic and small villages such as{Woodlands}and{Netley {Marsh}are losing their identities. The family farms are disappearing though the names linger on for the housing estates. The Netley Marsh Steam Rally has perhaps the greatest local identity and has assumed regional significance, but it is the neighbouring city of Southampton and the New Forest that overshadow the area.
